2: Oh, how I wish you[e] would kiss me passionately![f] For your lovemaking[g] is more delightful[h] than wine.[i]
3: The fragrance[j] of your colognes[k] is delightful;[l] your name[m] is like the finest[n] perfume.[o] No wonder the young women[p] adore[q] you!
4: Draw me[r] after you; let us hurry![s] May the king[t] bring[u] me into his[v] bedroom chambers![w] We will[y] rejoice and delight in you;[z] we will praise[aa] your love more than wine. How rightly[ab] the young women[ac] adore you!
5: I am dark but lovely, O maidens[ad] of Jerusalem, dark[ae] like the tents of Qedar,[af] lovely[ag] like the tent curtains[ah] of Salmah.[ai]
6: Do not stare at me because[aj] I am dark, for[ak] the sun has burned my skin.[al] My brothers[am] were angry[an] with me; they made me the keeper of the vineyards. Alas, my own vineyard[ao] I could not keep![ap]
7: Tell me, O you whom my heart[aq] loves, where do you pasture your sheep? Where do you rest your sheep during the midday heat? Tell me lest[ar] I wander around[as] beside the flocks of your companions!
8: If you do not know, O most beautiful of women, simply follow the tracks of my flock, and pasture your little lambs beside the tents of the shepherds.
9: O my beloved, you are like[at] a[au] mare[av] among Pharaoh's stallions.[aw]
10: Your cheeks are beautiful with ornaments; your neck is lovely[ax] with strings of jewels.
11: We[ay] will make for you gold ornaments studded with silver.[az]
12: While the king was at his banqueting table,[ba] my nard[bb] gave forth its fragrance.[bc]
13: My beloved is like a fragrant pouch of myrrh[bd] spending the night[be] between my breasts.
14: My beloved is like a cluster of henna blossoms[bf] in the vineyards of En Gedi.[bg]
15: Oh,[bh] how beautiful you are, my beloved![bi] Oh, how beautiful you are! Your eyes[bj] are like doves![bk]
16: Oh, how handsome you are, my lover![bl] Oh,[bm] how delightful[bn] you are! The lush foliage[bo] is our canopied bed;[bp]
17: the cedars are the beams of our bedroom chamber; the pines are the rafters of our bedroom.
